name: A Screw Loose
description:
You are a malfunctioning robot on a crashing space station. Can you make it out in one piece?
Each level, you will have a completely randomised set of characteristics and abilities - the controls for these abilities are mapped to different buttons. You have a short period of time before the level where you can figure out the controls & test out your abilities before being thrown into the action. Good luck!
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2020-"out of control".
